comment_data.body:
```suggestion
M.path.dirname = vim.fs.dirname

--- @deprecated use `vim.fs.normalize` instead
M.path.sanitize = vim.fs.normalize

--- @deprecated use `vim.loop.fs_stat` instead
--- @param filename string
--- @return string|false
function M.path.exists(filename)
```
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -395,10 +395,18 @@ function M.strip_archive_subpath(path)
   return path
 end
 
----@deprecated use `vim.fs.dirname` instead
+--- @deprecated use `vim.fs.dirname` instead
 M.dirname = vim.fs.dirname
 
 --- @deprecated use `vim.fs.normalize` instead
 M.sanitize = vim.fs.normalize
 
+--- @deprecated use `vim.loop.fs_stat` instead
+--- @param filename string
+--- @return string|false
+function M.exists(filename)

@@ -91,7 +91,7 @@ local function get_typescript_server_path(root_dir)
   local found_ts = ''
   local function check_dir(path)
     found_ts =  util.path.join(path, 'node_modules', 'typescript', 'lib')
-    if util.path.exists(found_ts) then
+    if vim.uv.fs_stat(found_ts) then

comment_data.body:
```suggestion
    return stat and stat.type == 'directory' or false
```
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -102,23 +102,24 @@ M.path = (function()
     return path:gsub('([%[%]%?%*])', '\\%1')
   end
 
-  --- @param filename string
-  --- @return string|false
-  local function exists(filename)
-    local stat = uv.fs_stat(filename)
-    return stat and stat.type or false
-  end
-
   --- @param filename string
   --- @return boolean
   local function is_dir(filename)
-    return exists(filename) == 'directory'
+    local stat = uv.fs_stat(filename)
+    if not stat then
+      return false
+    end
+    return stat.type == 'directory'

@@ -102,23 +102,24 @@ M.path = (function()
     return path:gsub('([%[%]%?%*])', '\\%1')
   end
 
-  --- @param filename string
-  --- @return string|false
-  local function exists(filename)
-    local stat = uv.fs_stat(filename)
-    return stat and stat.type or false
-  end
-
   --- @param filename string
   --- @return boolean
   local function is_dir(filename)
-    return exists(filename) == 'directory'
+    local stat = uv.fs_stat(filename)
+    if not stat then
+      return false
+    end
+    return stat.type == 'directory'

@@ -125,7 +125,7 @@ return {
       -- Support Yarn2 (PnP) projects
       local pnp_cjs = util.path.join(new_root_dir, '.pnp.cjs')
       local pnp_js = util.path.join(new_root_dir, '.pnp.js')
-      if util.path.exists(pnp_cjs) or util.path.exists(pnp_js) then

comment_data.body:
If we are going to insist that `vim.fs.exists` / `vim.fs.isdir` / etc. isn't needed, let's demonstrate how to use `fs_stat` in a non-verbose way :)

```suggestion
    return stat and stat.type == 'directory'
```
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -102,23 +102,24 @@ M.path = (function()
     return path:gsub('([%[%]%?%*])', '\\%1')
   end
 
-  --- @param filename string
-  --- @return string|false
-  local function exists(filename)
-    local stat = uv.fs_stat(filename)
-    return stat and stat.type or false
-  end
-
   --- @param filename string
   --- @return boolean
   local function is_dir(filename)
-    return exists(filename) == 'directory'
+    local stat = uv.fs_stat(filename)
+    if not stat then
+      return false
+    end
+    return stat.type == 'directory'

comment_data.body: Yes, but we still support version 0.9 which doesn't have vim.uv
